item.description:
Hi folks!

October could be called the best month for hiking, with its crispy cool weather, clear skies and colorful foliage! We have planned a second Meetup for this month, to ensure that we will all have another chance to take advantage of the October loveliness, and to get some exercise and breathe fresh air.

LOCATION: This Meetup will take place at West Rock, which is a Connecticut State Park located in New Haven and Hamden. There are various entrances to the park, but we will be parking at Lake Wintergreen.

PLAN: West Rock offers various levels of hiking, as it is a very large park. For this Meetup, we'd like to try a modest loop, beginning at Lake Wintergreen. We will choose a route that is manageable for the average hiker. No climbing will be required, but the hike may involve maneuvering over some rocky sections of trail.

WHERE AND WHEN: Meet at the Lake Wintergreen entrance between 7:45 and 8, and we'll try to get rolling onto the trail by 8:15. This particular hike shouldn't take more than 3 hours, including stops.

BRING: A bottle of WATER! (And a snack if you like.)

WEAR: Hiking or other sturdy shoes with treads. LAYERS (something warm enough, over something cool enough, to be comfortable in the outdoors).

COST: We ask for a donation of one dollar, towards the monthly fee that is charged by the Meetup Website. Please bring any contributions with you on the day of the hike.

Park website
Google Map - Approximate Location of Park Entrance

DIRECTIONS: The directions on the website seem vague. I have put together directions, which I will email to all who RSVP.

PARKING NOTE: There is no fee for parking in the lot.
item.how_to_find_us: Sarah (Group Organizer) will be wearing a red sweatshirt and a green cap

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: Early-bird Hiking Second Chance October Meetup
